group_1.narration: ―Mitama―@Teacher's memories are flowing into my mind@like I'd lived them myself.
―Kanagi―@Those friends she survived together@with on the streets getting snuffed out.
―Mitama―@Her friends from the circus troupe dying@and being reduced to corpses.
―Kanagi―@Memories of her family,@in the years before she was kidnapped.
―Mitama―@Memories of being slowly@crushed by the underworld.
―Kanagi―@Memories of being tossed about@by so much turmoil.
―Mitama―@Memories of experiencing prejudice@because of her blood...
―Kanagi―@She was able to look upon the misfortunes of the world from above@and tried to live without being consumed by her circumstances.
―Mitama―@But when she finally returned to a world full of good people,@she had an even more difficult time than before.
―Kanagi―@Yet instead of bottling up her grief until it turns to hate,@she uses it as sustenance and tries to settle it calmly.
―Mitama―@Is she telling us to do the same, to use that@sustenance to remake our fallen selves anew?
"That's how it is."
"It doesn't matter how you season it,@just drag out that pitiable part of yourself@and gobble it down."
―Mitama―@But, no matter how wide my perspective is, it doesn't@change that I will be the one to destroy Kamihama City.
―Mitama―@And moreover, if I consume this grief,@I will surely lose who I am.
―Kanagi―@...That may indeed be true.
―Kanagi―@However, Yakumo,@it also possibly may not be.
―Mitama―@Kanagi...?
―Kanagi―@We will destroy the Kamihama City within ourselves,@filled with sorrow and grief,
―Kanagi―@and then, we'll go together to that@Kamihama City where people coexist.
―Mitama―@To that Kamihama that Mii@and everyone else brought together...?
―Kanagi―@Yes. And for that,@we must devour our old selves...
―Mitama―@...and use that as our sustenance.
―Kanagi―@Indeed. For the sake of the future,@this will be the end of us being imprisoned by grief.
―Mitama―@...I understand.
―Mitama―@For the sake of the tomorrow that Mii connected together,@I'll devour my past.

group_1.textLeft: Come, the me who has closed her eyes,@you who is driven by resentment.

group_1.textRight: I'll destroy the Kamihama festering inside of me,@and I'll move forward into the future.
